name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, brown ground beef with onions and garlic. 3. Add canned tomatoes, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 15 minutes. 4. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti.

name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: 1. Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions. 2. In a saucepan, melt butter and sauté garlic. 3. Add heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, cooked chicken, salt, and pepper. 4. Simmer until the sauce thickens. 5. Toss the sauce with cooked pasta and serve.

name: Vegetarian Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, carrots)
instructions: 1. In a wok or skillet, heat vegetable oil. 2. Add garlic and ginger, sauté until fragrant. 3. Add tofu and stir-fry until golden. 4. Add mixed vegetables, soy sauce, and sesame oil. Stir-fry until vegetables are tender. 5. Serve over cooked rice.

name: Grilled Salmon
instructions: 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. 2. Brush salmon fillets with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, and dried dill. 3. Place salmon on the grill and cook for 4-5 minutes per side or until the fish flakes easily. 4. Serve with sliced lemon.

name: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to the highest temperature. 2. Roll out pizza dough and spread pizza sauce. 3. Arrange fresh mozzarella slices and fresh basil leaves. 4. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. 5. Bake in the oven until crust is golden and cheese is melted.
